resources.string:
I have used to following libraries 
-Retrofit: for making network based API call
-OkHttp: for caching response to avoid the network completely repeating requests
-GSON Annotations: for mapping POJO class with JSON fields 
-Picasso: for loading and caching image data
-ButtterKnife: for injecting views 
-Dagger 2: for handling Dependency

I have used SQLite and SharedPreferences for caching data

 I have used Android Studio 1.4 for the development work
